div.ab:
يتسلّم الشّيخ نجيب بن عزّ مبادي مبادئ السّيّدى الفيّوميّ
حملين دقيق وهم لحمد لمحمّد بن عبد العقّال العقار الغفّار
واللّه اللّه تكون تحطّهم في موضع جيّد
إلى شونة أبو مفرّج والسّلام عليك ورحمة اللّه
وحضر إسماعيل وهو يسلّم عليك

yatasallami ăš šayḫu naǧību bnu ʿizzu mabādī mabādiʾa ăs ăl sayyidiyyu fayyūmiyyu
ḥimlayni daqīq wa hum li ḥamdi muḥammadi bni ʿabdi ăl ʿaqqāli ʿaqāri ġaffāri
wa ăl lāhu ăl lāhu takūn taḥuṭṭu hum fī mawḍiʿ:in ǧayyid:in
ʾilà šūnaẗi ʾabū mufarriǧ:in wa ăs salāmu ʿalay ka wa raḥmaẗu ăl lāhi
wa ḥaḍara ʾismāʿīlu wa huwa yusallimu ʿalay ka

Shaykh Najīb ibn Mabādī al-Sayyidī (al-Fayyūmī?) is to receive Shaykh Najib `Izz Mabadi has delivered
two loads of flour, which are for Ḥamd ibn ʿAbd al-ʿAqqāl. two loads of flour which are for Hamad b. `Abd al-`Aqar.
By God, weigh them and put them in a good place, O God! O God! put them in a safe place.
to the shuna of Abu Mufarrij. Peace be upon you [familiar form] and blessings. To the warehouse of Abū Mufarrij. Peace be upon you. God's mercy [be upon you].
Isma`il is here and greets you! Ismāʿīl is here and sends his regards to you.
